value.title: StarCraft 2: WEIRD Cannon Rush Counters! (Viewer Games)
value.excerpt: Viewer submitted games of StarCraft 2. In these matches we have a look at some questionable Cannon Rushes, with even more questionable responses.  If you want me to cast your StarCraft 2 match next, you can submit your best game to replays@lowko.tv.   Support my work on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/lowkotv

value.title: StarCraft 2: Maru's Rush FAILS vs MaxPax!
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 between Maru (Terran) and MaxPax (Protoss). This game starts off with a little bit of cheese, but quickly transitions towards a laid back macro match where Maru is trying to turtle his way out of his bad early game.
